title: Jeremy Corbyn accused of being a ‘sanctimonious hypocrite’ over football racism outrage
text:
Jeremy Corbyn has been accused of being “sanctimonious hypocrite” for saying racism in football must be tackled while his own party is under investigation for anti-Semitism.

After “abhorrent racism” targeting English players from Bulgarian fans at last night’s match, the Labour leader tweeted that UEFA “needs to do far more to tackle this kind of abuse”.

However, former Labour MP Ian Austin stated that “someone who has seen the Labour Party poisoned by racism” under his leadership was in “no place to say this”.

“Sort your own house out first, you sanctimonious hypocrite,” he added.

The Equality and Human Rights Commission opened a formal investigation into Labour’s failure to protect Jewish members...
description: Jeremy Corbyn has been accused of being “sanctimonious hypocrite” for saying racism in football must be tackled while his own party is under investigation for anti-Semitism.
